qt_master::PointCloudManipulator Class Reference

The PointCloudManipulator class contains a number of filtering methods, algorithms and matching methods. More...

Detailed Description

The PointCloudManipulator class contains a number of filtering methods, algorithms and matching methods.

Eigen::Matrix4f qt_master::PointCloudManipulator::computeInitialAlignmentFPFH ( pcl::PointCloud< pcl::PointXYZRGB >::Ptr  sourcePoints,
pcl::PointCloud< pcl::FPFHSignature33 >::Ptr  sourceDescriptors,
pcl::PointCloud< pcl::PointXYZRGB >::Ptr  targetPoints,
pcl::PointCloud< pcl::FPFHSignature33 >::Ptr  targetDescriptors,
float  minSampleDistance,
float  maxCorrespondenceDistance,
int  nrIterations 
)

Implementation of estimating an initial alignment of FPFH feature descriptors.

Parameters
sourcePointsinput point cloud of cloud 1
sourceDescriptorsinput FPFH descriptors for cloud 1
targetPointsinput point cloud of cloud 2
targetDescriptorsinput FPFH descriptors for cloud 2
minSampleDistanceminimum sample distance in alignment estimation
maxCorrespondenceDistancemaximum correspondence distance in alignment estimation
nrIterationsnr of iterations to run before "giving up"
Returns
Returns a 4x4 transformation matrix of the estimated transformation
